author: Dartunorro Clark
title: Trump says he is halting funding for the World Health Organization
description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday he is halting U.S. funding to the World Health Organization after the organization criticized his early response to the coronavirus epidemic.
content:
President Donald Trump on Tuesday announced he is halting funding for the World Health Organization after the organization criticized his early response to the coronavirus epidemic.
Trump accused the WHO of "severely mismanaging and covering up" the coronavi… [+623 chars]
